articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play Australia in the final of the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: World Cup final: India v Australia - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Max Verstappen fights back from a five-second penalty and dropping to fifth place at half-distance to win a gripping Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen wins gripping Las Vegas Grand Prix

articles.description: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke admits "mixed feelings" over the absence of Norway striker Erling Haaland for Sunday's Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: Clarke's 'mixed feeling' over Haaland Hampden absence

articles.description: India's Virat Kohli is dismissed for 54 by Australian captain Pat Cummins after he edges onto his own stumps during the Cricket World Cup final in Ahmedabad.
articles.title: 'Stunned into silence' - Kohli goes for 54 to Cummins

articles.description: With an appeal to come, plus pending financial cases against Manchester City and Chelsea, at look at why Everton's points deduction sent shockwaves through the Premier League.
articles.title: Why Everton sanction sent shockwaves through Premier League

articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma hayes is full of praise for hat-trick hero Lauren James, with the forward's form a welcome boost for club and country.
articles.title: James is 'country's most gifted footballer' - Hayes

articles.description: Ice hockey players and fans pay tribute to the late Adam Johnson at Nottingham's Motorpoint Arena.
articles.title: Tributes paid in first Panthers game since player's death

articles.description: Former Wales captain Alun Wyn Jones is given a standing ovation as he departs the final game of his rugby career for Toulon at Clermont Auvergne.
articles.title: Ex-Wales captain Jones ends career to ovation

articles.description: Former WBA super-flyweight world champion Kal Yafai announces his retirement after loss against Jonathan Rodriguez.
articles.title: Former world champion Yafai retires

articles.description: Watch live coverage as Scotland's men take on Sweden before the women meet Italy in the European Curling Championships.
articles.title: Watch: Scotland men v Sweden in European Curling Championships
